name: AVPlayerInterstitialEvent
desc: An object that provides instructions for how a player presents interstitial content.

items.name: init(primaryItem: AVPlayerItem, identifier: String?, time: CMTime, templateItems: [AVPlayerItem], restrictions: AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions, resumptionOffset: CMTime, playoutLimit: CMTime, userDefinedAttributes: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates an interstitial event, with user-defined attributes, for the specified time.

items.name: init(primaryItem: AVPlayerItem, identifier: String?, date: Date, templateItems: [AVPlayerItem], restrictions: AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions, resumptionOffset: CMTime, playoutLimit: CMTime, userDefinedAttributes: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates an interstitial event, with user-defined attributes, for the specified date.

items.name: var userDefinedAttributes: [AnyHashable : Any]
items.desc: Attributes of the event that the vendor or app defines.

items.name: var primaryItem: AVPlayerItem?
items.desc: The player item that represents the primary content.

items.name: var templateItems: [AVPlayerItem]
items.desc: The array of player item configurations to use as templates for player items that play interstitial content.

items.name: var date: Date?
items.desc: A date within the date range of the primary content that playback of interstitial content begins.

items.name: var time: CMTime
items.desc: A time within the timeline of the primary content that playback of interstitial content begins.

items.name: var resumptionOffset: CMTime
items.desc: A time offset at which playback of primary content resumes after interstitial content finishes.

items.name: var playoutLimit: CMTime
items.desc: The time offset at which playback of the interstitial ends.

items.name: var restrictions: AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions
items.desc: The restrictions the event imposes on the playback of interstitial content.

items.name: struct AVPlayerInterstitialEvent.Restrictions
items.desc: Constants that define restrictions on the playback of interstitial content.
